title: Nemesis
description: THE TOWER OF REGRETSYou who sit at my side by the fire;you whose restless ghosts walk in the shadows ofmy dreams; you children yet unborn:If you would see your people live and prosper, thenlet these ancient stones lie in solitude.For this is the burden that the Earth our Motherhas set upon us all, and this is the trustshe places in our hearts. We must not fail her.Anghara is daughter to a king. In all the world there is but one thing denied herâ€”the secret of the Tower. Tormented, she must seek its truth.And her discovery will remake the world.(from the back cover)
